body:
How is the speed with VMWare? I'd love to use it rather than trying to
	make my laptop a dual-boot, however I do a lot of heavy 3D and need
	whatever speed I can get sometimes...


	Thanks!


	Jeffrey McGrew






	I use vmware on my laptop (1.7GHz, 512MB RAM) and on the 3GHz office PC. There is no slowdown - the speed is the same as if you would run it on native Linux/Unix. The setup on laptops is no problem whatsoever. vmware recognizes the graphics card automatically. Heavy 3D doesn't need more than 150 MB RAM, so I run Photoshop and Radiance even on the laptop at the same time. Actually, I use vmware more than Linux dualboot on the office PC, because you always need some microsoft programs. 


	Martin
